titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the federal Government should actively pursue a unified approach to strengthen and promote the national policy on aquaculture.
A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the federal Government should actively pursue a unified approach to strengthen and promote the national policy on aquaculture.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: States that the Senate calls on the Federal Government to actively pursue a unified approach to strengthen and promote the national policy on aquaculture.
